constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 197 (Friday, November 12, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. LARSEN of Washington:
H.R. 5957.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 1--all legislative powers herein
granted shall be vested in a Congress of the United States,
which shall consist of a Senate and House of representatives.
[Page H6247]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Oceans, and Wildlife.

title: To reduce risks to marine mammals, and for other purposes.
